author: Staff Reporter
text:
With foggy weather likely to increase the feed intake in layer poultry, farmers were asked to keep the energy content at a higher level and refrain from use of high moisture maize.

A press release from Agromet Field Unit of Veterinary College and Research Institute and Regional Meteorological Centre, Chennai, said that the sky will be slightly cloudy with less chance of rainfall.

The maximum is expected to be 32 degree Celsius, and the minimum temperature 18 degree Celsius.

Immediate use of manufactured feed will prevent birds from excess feed intake.

Birds should be protected from direct exposure to cold weather.
title: Advisory for poultry farmers
